document.full_text: johnson & johnson, following repeated u.s. recalls of tylenol and other nonprescription drugs in the past year, said it will make its u.s. over-the-counter business a separate organization.
document.title: j&j reorganizes consumer group in wake of recalls
lines_and_colors: johnson & johnson, following repeated u.s. recalls of tylenol and other nonprescription drugs in the past year, said it will make its u.s. over-the-counter business a separate organization.
